title: ward idea riot
body: So I was just thinking that sometimes you will hit a ward 1/2 times but not kill it and it will stay up for the 3min duration now what im thinking is if you hit it 1 time then its up for 2min hit it 2 times up for 1 min I think it would be a great idea to implement into the game.

replies.body: So basically you want wards to lose 1 minute value if they get hit?
well yes it makes sense if you damage it then it wont work as long
I agree it does make it seem fair because it's damaged it's gonna 'damaged'.
you are a smart man I like you
Sorry I worded this incorrectly. I ment to say "I agree it does make it seem fair because it's damaged it's going to be 'weakened'."
I really don't see any reason for this to be in the game, I guess its an extra layer of depth or something. I feel like it would just be more annoying than anything though.
